name: Scopaesthesia
description:
Chemical Games Studio releases its official debut title, a cooperative game taking familiar elements from some of the most prominent horror titles made in the last two decades. Go it alone in a memorable yet revitalized experience, or team up with friends for a twist on this classic jump-scare formula.

Brief


After receiving a strange text message, you've returned to your hometown in the Midwest. However, upon your arrival you hear an old high school friend has gone missing. What's even stranger is others who grew up and left the town came back receiving the same text. Work together to find the source of this message, and get to the bottom of this disappearance about your friend...

A combination of horrors, new and old


Combining both elements of modern horror games, such as cooperative play, in-game voice chat, and spectating with an old jump-scare formula, Scopaesthesia is a unique but familiar horror game. Try your hand at completing the objective alone or with friends, coupled with a few new twists along the way. But, an entity lurks in the shadows, and not everything is what it seems...

What awaits


From a simple collection objective to multi-layered puzzles, Scopaesthesia will have several characters, maps, items, and more. Brace yourself for the excitement and horror you are about to experience.
